specifications.title: Object Data Instance Notation (ODIN)
specifications.summary: This is the JSON-like notation used to express various sections of ADL archetypes including description, terminology and annotations, and also BMM files.

specifications.title: Basic Meta-Model (BMM)
specifications.summary: BMM provides a human- and machine-readable / writable format for defining object models. It can be considered a much more compact and readable alternative to XMI.

specifications.title: BMM Persistence Model and Syntax
specifications.summary: A human-readable and machine-processable save format for BMM.

specifications.title: Basic Expression Language (BEL)
specifications.summary: The openEHR Basic Expression Language defines a basic model and syntax for specifying expressions and statements for use in archetype rules.

specifications.title: Expression Language (EL)
specifications.summary: The openEHR Expression Language defines an advanced object / functional syntax for specifying expressions for use elsewhere in openEHR, e.g. Task Planning, guidelines, rules etc.
specifications.micro_summary: An advanced expression language based on BMM

expressions.title: LANG UML
expressions.description: UML file for openEHR Language model classes, as MagicDraw 19. Contains UML 2.5 standard XMI file.
